title: How to Fold an Origami Sail Boat

steps.title: Obtain a piece of 8 1/2 x 11 inch computer paper.
steps.content: Obtain a piece of 8 1/2 x 11 inch computer paper.

steps.title: Fold down the corners to make a triangle
steps.content: Fold down the corners to make a triangle .

steps.title: Fold the bottom flaps over the edge of the triangle
steps.content: Fold the bottom flaps over the edge of the triangle on both sides to form an origami hat.

steps.title: Flatten by opening the figure and folding the right and left corners together.
steps.content: Flatten by opening the figure and folding the right and left corners together.

steps.title: Fold the bottom up about 2 inches (5.1 cm), front and back.
steps.content: Fold the bottom up about 2 inches (5.1 cm), front and back.

steps.title: Flatten again by opening the figure and folding the right and left corners together.
steps.content: Flatten again by opening the figure and folding the right and left corners together.

steps.title: Fold the bottom about an inch up.
steps.content: Fold the bottom about an inch up.

steps.title: Pull the corners out.
steps.content: Pull the corners out. There you have it â€“ a Sailboat!
